description: Custom mountain estate on over eight pastoral acres with breathtaking Uinta Mountain views. Contemporary ranch design features great room with soaring ceilings and floor-to-ceiling stone fireplace. Gourmet kitchen with waterfall island, butler's pantry, and walk-in pantry. Five bedroom suites include master wing with private office, spa bathroom, and mountain deck. Finished walkout basement with family room, wet bar, and guest quarters. Horse barn with eight stalls, equipment storage, and hay loft. Fenced pastures with irrigation water.

description: Rustic mountain home with log and stone construction on over four acres. Open living area features exposed beam ceilings, river rock fireplace, and walls of glass overlooking meadows. Country kitchen with granite counters, farmhouse sink, and breakfast nook. Four bedrooms include master loft with mountain views and spa bathroom. Covered porches wrap around home for outdoor living and entertaining. Three-car garage with workshop space. Horse facilities include barn, fenced paddocks, and creek running through property.

description: Stunning mountain modern home with Deer Creek Reservoir and mountain views. Open concept main level features great room with linear fireplace, dining area, and gourmet kitchen. Kitchen features waterfall quartz island, butler's pantry, and high-end appliances. Five bedrooms include master suite with private deck overlooking reservoir and spa bathroom. Finished basement with family room, bedroom, bathroom, and wet bar. Three-car garage with workshop area. Close to championship golf course, boating, and recreation facilities.

description: Traditional mountain home with six bedrooms and valley views perfect for large families. Formal living and dining rooms feature hardwood floors and mountain vistas. Family kitchen with granite counters opens to family room with stone fireplace. Six bedrooms include master suite with en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet. Finished basement provides additional family room, bedroom, and storage. Private backyard with covered patio, play area, and mature landscaping. Two-car garage with workshop. Walking distance to schools and community facilities.
